mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.user_id, p.title, p.create_time, p.comment_count, p.like_count FROM campus_forum.like l JOIN post p ON p.id = l.entity_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND l.entity_type = 1 AND l.status = 1 ORDER BY l.create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM campus_forum.like WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND entity_id = #{postId} AND entity_type = 1 AND status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO campus_forum.like (user_id, entity_type, entity_id, entity_user_id, status, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, 1, #{postId}, (SELECT user_id FROM post WHERE id = #{postId}), 1, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status = 1, update_time = NOW()
mapper.delete: UPDATE campus_forum.like SET status = 0, update_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND entity_id = #{postId} AND entity_type = 1
